refactoring issues.

In my specific case, this is perfect. The difference f=
rom the example
is that I created a concrete non-anonymous subclass of Filt=
er, and it
is passed the matching test names, which are provided as argumen=
ts to
the main() method of my test classes. These arguments are only
provid=
ed during focused testing and development, and are *very*
dynamic. In norma=
l operation, the filter I created from Kent's example
is not even used.

Th=
anks for the input!
